name: server

scripts.build: tsc && if not exist dist\database mkdir dist\database && xcopy /Y /I database\*.sql dist\database\ && xcopy /Y /I database\*.js dist\database\ && if not exist dist\controllers mkdir dist\controllers && xcopy /Y /E /I controllers dist\controllers && if not exist dist\routes mkdir dist\routes && xcopy /Y /E /I routes dist\routes && if not exist dist\middlewares mkdir dist\middlewares && xcopy /Y /E /I middlewares dist\middlewares && if not exist dist\utils mkdir dist\utils && xcopy /Y /E /I utils dist\utils && xcopy /Y backup.config.json dist\backup.config.json

description: Backend API for Inventory Management System
